verses.text:
BURIED beneath the yielding wave
The great Redeemer lies;
Faith views him in the watery grave,
And thence beholds him rise.

Thus do his willing saints to-day,
Their ardent zeal express,
And in the Lord's appointed way,
Fulfill all righteousness.

With joy we in his footstep tread,
And would his cause maintainâ€“
Like him be numbered with the dead,
And with him rise and reign.

His presence oft revives our hearts,
And drives our fears away;
When he commands, and strength imparts,
We cheerfully obey.
